channel.title: Lost in Space on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lost in Space on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A $17 Hotdog and a Humanoid Robot Serving Popcorn: WIRED's Day at the Tesla Diner
item.description: WIRED stopped by the new Tesla Diner in Hollywood to try a $17 hotdog, watch a humanoid robot serve popcorn, and talk to people who still stan Elon Musk.
